Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 45th overall pick, by Halifax in 1981...
Injured on 5/2/1982 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Injured on 5/30/1986 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 5 days...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 8/11/1987, off Stephen Hanchett (TRO)...
Traded from Halifax to Pittsburgh on 2/12/1989 (Going to PIT: 2B P. Michaelson, P J. Segura. Going to HAL: CF T. Dunkle)...
Won World Championship with Pittsburgh in 1991...
